DataElement.preferredDefinition: The organism from which the sample is derived or originated.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._A living entity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Property.preferredDefinition: A living thing, such as an animal, a plant, a bacterium, or a fungus.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

DataElementConcept.origin: MCL:Molecular and Cellular Characterization of Screened Lesions
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/21/20 jk per SME, moved DEC from Sample CSI to MCL Genomics Core CSI. 11/19/18 jk Released per PI/Maureen at Oct 2018 Steering Comm meeting.   3/8/18 jk created for MCL Genomics.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A living entity._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any of numerous species of small rodents belonging to the genus Mus and various related genera of the family Muridae.

Concepts.definition: Any of numerous species of small rodents belonging to the genus Mus and various related genera of the family Muridae.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: 03/29/2007 - Updated with NCI Thesaurus definition and concept code.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The bipedal primate mammal, Homo sapiens; belonging to man or mankind; pertaining to man or to the race of man; use of man as experimental subject or unit of analysis in research.

Concepts.definition: The bipedal primate mammal, Homo sapiens; belonging to man or mankind; pertaining to man or to the race of man; use of man as experimental subject or unit of analysis in research.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A permanently established cell culture that will proliferate indefinitely given appropriate fresh medium and space.

Concepts.definition: A permanently established cell culture that will proliferate indefinitely given appropriate fresh medium and space.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Body tissue, region, surface, cavity, fluid, organ, or collection of organs.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A living thing, such as an animal, a plant, a bacterium, or a fungus.:Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
